ds_id: Apple to Release ‘Argylle’ Theatrically in Partnership with Universal@IndieWire@2023-06-15 12:54:34.504252@Apple
data_content: Apple's upcoming spy thriller, "Argylle," directed by Matthew Vaughn and starring Henry Cavill, will have a wide theatrical release through a distribution partnership with Universal Pictures before heading to the streaming platform Apple TV+. This follows a similar strategy for Apple's previous movies, "Killers of the Flower Moon" and "Napoleon," which are also getting theatrical releases before streaming. It is unclear whether the partnership with Universal is a one-off or a sign of more to come. Apple is planning to invest $1 billion annually into movies with theatrical releases, and "Argylle" is set to be released in theaters on February 2, 2024.
